articles.title: Asian Games 2023 India Schedule On 6 Oct: Watch Hockey, Kabaddi & Cricket Events - The Quint
articles.description: Asian Games 2023 India Schedule Day 13 for Friday, 6 October: Check out the events, timings, and fixtures of all sports.
articles.content: The Asian Games 2023 event is moving towards its final stage and we are back with the full India schedule in the Asian Games 2023. Till now, India has maintained its 4th position with 21 gold medals,… [+550 chars]

articles.author: Mihir Vasavda
articles.title: Asian Games, compound archery: After multiple gold medals from Jyothi & Co, coach Sanjeeva Singh, who brought it to India, basks in glory - The Indian Express
articles.description: Mihir Vasavda writes from Hangzhou: The man who brought the format to the country and trained the first champions revels in the achievements of Jyothi, Ojas & Co.
articles.content: Sanjeeva Singh tries not to gloat but this is his I told you so moment.In 2004, when he introduced compound archery in India, the Arjuna and Dronacharya awardee was laughed out from training centres … [+4923 chars]
